desc: Wipes all valid sessions on all devices for a given user

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user to wipe sessions for

cannot_reset_primary_owner.desc: Only primary owner can reset primary owner's sessions

feature_not_enabled.desc: This method is not available for this product level

internal_error.desc: There was an internal error processing this request! Please try again.

invalid_auth.desc: The token doesn't have access to this endpoint

not_an_admin.desc: This method is only accessible by org/compliance team owners and admins

unknown_method.desc: This method is currently not available

user_session_reset_failed.desc: There was an error starting the session reset. Try again.
